DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find risk factor hemorrhagic stroke , specifically intracerebral hemorrhage ( ICH ) .
DOC.brief_title: Genetic Environmental Risk Factors Hemorrhagic Stroke-GERFHS III
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Resident ( 6 month longer ) within 100 mile University Cincinnati . Fulfillment criterion spontaneous ICH No evidence trauma , brain tumor/metastases , hemorrhagic transformation ischemic stroke infectious process cause hemorrhage . Ability patient legal representative provide consent interview , blood pressure determination DNA sampling .
